Lens Platform API:

  • Add Team
    • POST /add-team
  • Approve
    • POST /approve
  • Disable Account
    • POST /disable-account
  • All Kits
    • POST /kit/get-all-kits
  • Get Brains Details
    • POST /brains/get-all-brains
  • Get Brains List
    • POST /agents/get-brains-list
  • Get Company Details
    • POST /get-company-details
  • Get Insights List
    • POST /agents/get-insights-list
  • Get Page Description
    • POST /get-page-description?page=insights
  • Get Teams
    • POST /get-teams
  • Get User History
    • POST /get-user-history
  • Payments
    • POST /payment/get-all-plans
  • Upload Image
    • POST /upload-image

Lens Agent API:

  • Add Update Agent
    • POST /agents/add-update-agent
  • Get All Agents Analytics
    • GET /agents/get-agents-analytics
  • Get Agent Info
    • GET /agents/get-agents-info
  • Get All Agents
    • GET /agents/get-all-agents
  • Add and Update Domain
    • POST /agents/add-edit-brains
  • Agent Brain Selected
    • GET /agents/get-agent-brains-selected
  • Add and Update Data Relationship
    • POST /agents/add-edit-data-relation
  • Data Relationship
    • GET /agents/get-data-relation
  • Data Relationship Template
    • GET /agents/get-data-relation-template
  • Add and Update Insight
    • POST /agents/add-edit-insights
  • Agent Insights Selected
    • GET /agents/get-agent-insights-selected
  • Add and Update Domain
    • GET /agents/add-update-domains
    • POST /agents/add-update-domains
  • API Keys
    • GET /agents/get-api-keys
  • Whitelisted Domain
    • GET /agents/get-whitelist-domains
    • POST /agents/add-update-domains
  • Delete Agent
    • DEL /agents/delete-agent
  • Edit Agent Settings
    • POST /agents/edit-agent-settings
  • Agent Settings
    • GET /agents/get-agent-settings

Add and Update Domain¶

GET /agents/add-update-domains¶

Retrieve a list of domains

Example Request:

import requests
import json

url = "lensservice.polynomial.ai/agents/get-whitelist-domains?agentID=6180bae8d7ba18b5e895b4c8"

payload = ""
headers = {
  'apikey': '{{apikey}}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)
Headers

apikey

Params

agentID

POST /agents/add-update-domains¶

Update list of domains

Example Request

Headers

apikey

Request Body

agentID
